exercise.title: Hammertoss FireEye Report
exercise.name: hammertoss_report
exercise.shortdescription: Analyze this FireEye Report documenting an APT group.
exercise.description: Read through and analyze the Hammertoss report by FireEye, which documents a stealthy nation state APT group.
exercise.tutorial: On your defensive workstation, open the Vendor Reports directory in the share drive and answer the questions below.

question.text: What HAMMERTOSS variant communicates directly with a CnC server?
How does the hammertoss malware create twitter handles?
question.answer: uses a basename and appends and prepends three CRC32 values based on the date.
question.wrong: uses a basename and appends three CRC32 values based on the date.
uses a basename and prepends three CRC32 values based on the date.
uses a basename and appends and prepends three random values.

question.text: How does the malware try to blend in?
question.answer: Only communicates during active work hours in order to hide with the normal network traffic.
question.wrong: Only communicates during non work hours, so that a network admin isn't around to catch it.
Only communicates on one particular day each week, so that it is infrequent enough to be noticed.
Only communicates when certain network conditions are met, so that it doesn't get caught during a network scan.

question.text: When an APT29 operator tweets, what does the hashtag part of the tweet do?
question.answer: Tells the malware to retrieve the instructions from that particular offset of the image file downloaded at the url and decrypt using that specific string.
question.wrong: Tells the malware to retrieve the instructions from that hashtags page on twitter.
Tells the malware the coordinates of the DNS server to travel to and what XOR operation to perform in order to retrieve the next instructions.
Tags the specific malware in order to keep track of what instructions to execute.

question.text: Where does HAMMERTOSS visit to download an image?
How does HAMMERTOSS visit the url specified in the tweet?
Where does HAMMERTOSS exfil victims user data?
question.wrong: To a remote server in Ukraine.
To a redirector, which then beacons back to a server in Russia.
